macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US500 Index Mixed on January 7, Closes at 6949 Points Up 0.06%
items.summary: The US500 rose slightly to 6949 points, gaining 0.06% on January 7, 2026, after an earlier dip to 6932 points down 0.19%. Over the past month, it climbed 1.50% and is up 17.42% year-over-year.

items.title: Wall Street Cools After Hot Start; S&P 500 Flat, Dow Dips Slightly
items.summary: On January 7, the S&P 500 was virtually unchanged after hitting a new all-time high, Dow dropped 0.1% from its record, while Nasdaq rose 0.7% led by Nvidia (up 1.6%) and Microsoft (up 1.9%). Roughly 70% of S&P stocks lost ground amid mixed trading.

items.title: Dow Jones Closes 1.02% Higher at 49478 on January 6
items.summary: The Dow Jones rose 501 points or 1.02% on January 6, 2026, led by gains in Amazon (3.37%), Amgen (3.01%), and Salesforce (2.59%). S&P 500 and Dow hit historic highs amid Fed rate cut expectations.

items.title: Treasury Yields Dip as Fed Rate Cut Hopes Persist
items.summary: The 10-year Treasury yield fell to 4.14% from 4.18%, and the two-year yield slipped to 3.46% from 3.47% on January 7, reflecting expectations for Fed rate cuts despite persistent high inflation. The Fed cut rates three times last year but signaled fewer ahead.

items.title: Cal-Maine Foods Shares Drop Despite Strong Quarterly Profit
items.summary: Cal-Maine Foods fell 3.9% on January 7 after reporting stronger-than-expected quarterly profit, dragged by lower egg prices that reduced revenue more than anticipated.

items.title: Nasdaq 100 Down 0.11%, US100 at 25611; VIX Up Slightly
items.summary: The US100 (Nasdaq 100) closed at 25611, down 0.11% or 28 points on January 7. The VIX rose 0.25% to 15.00 amid market drift.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Surpasses $90,000 as Crypto Market Recovers, Total Cap Exceeds $3 Trillion
items.summary: Bitcoin has climbed back above $90,000, reaching around $92,000, signaling market recovery after December's drop to $85,000, with total crypto market cap over $3 trillion. Altcoins like Solana (up 15% to $150), BNB (above $800), and XRP (near $2.20) also gained 5-10%.

items.title: Bitcoin Forecast Predicts Test of $90,205 Support Before Rally to $96,765
items.summary: BTC/USD at $91,318 is in a bullish channel with short-term bearish correction expected, testing support at 90,205 before potential growth to 96,765 or higher. Downside risk below 85,205 could lead to $78,505.

items.title: Stanford Professor's Babylon Raises $15M from a16z for Bitcoin Collateral Protocol
items.summary: Babylon, co-founded by Stanford professor David Tse, secured $15 million from a16z crypto to launch BTCVaults, a decentralized protocol allowing Bitcoin yield generation without relinquishing control to middlemen like Coinbase or Tether. Plans integration with Aave in Q2 2026.

items.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Rally in Early 2026, But Washington Policy Risks Loom
items.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum are gaining momentum at the start of 2026, though the uptrend's sustainability depends on upcoming U.S. policy decisions in Washington.

items.title: Warning: 4 Major Token Unlocks Scheduled for January 2026
items.summary: Several significant token unlocks are set for January 2026, which may cause market confusion but not necessarily crashes; investors advised against panic selling or blind holding.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: BigHat Biosciences Partners with Eli Lilly on AI-Enabled Biologics Discovery
items.summary: BigHat Biosciences announced a collaboration with Eli Lilly to advance machine learning-enabled biologics discovery using Lilly's TuneLab platform, leveraging BigHat's ML expertise and Milliner platform to generate high-quality datasets for antibody developability models.

items.title: AI and ML Expand Role in Service Provider Networks for 2026
items.summary: Service providers are increasingly integrating AI and ML into networks for predictive analytics, self-healing capabilities, and reduced latency via NPU-enabled edge devices, with adoption accelerating in customer service and network performance management.

items.title: AI-DFT Framework Accelerates Materials Discovery
items.summary: A new review highlights AI-integrated DFT frameworks that speed up materials research, enabling rapid prediction of properties in perovskites, semiconductors, and 2D materials through closed-loop systems combining prediction, verification, and learning.

items.title: LLMs Automate Extraction of Experimental Data from Scientific Papers
items.summary: Researchers developed tools using large language models to extract figures, tables, and sample data from open-access scientific papers, accelerating the construction of materials property databases for machine learning applications.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Xbox Game Pass January 2026 Lineup Expanded with Star Wars Outlaws and Resident Evil Village
items.summary: Xbox announced additional titles joining Game Pass this month, including Star Wars Outlaws on January 13, Resident Evil Village, Final Fantasy on January 8, and others like Lost in Random: The Eternal Die on January 7. Five titles such as Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn will leave on January 15.

items.title: Original Final Fantasy Joins Xbox Game Pass on January 8
items.summary: The classic Final Fantasy is arriving on Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, Premium, and PC Game Pass for Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S on January 8, 2026.

items.title: New Game Plus Showcase to Feature 45 Upcoming Xbox and PC Games on January 8
items.summary: The debut New Game Plus Showcase on January 8 at 1:00pm PT will highlight 45 AAA and indie titles with gameplay and developer interviews, including Atomic Heart 2, Shadow of the Road, Dinoblade, and The Cube.

items.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season One Reloaded Launches January 8 with New Maps and Fallout Crossover
items.summary: Black Ops 7's Season One Reloaded update arrives January 8, adding new maps like Zarya Cosmodome for Zombies, weapons such as Hawker HX sniper and Sturmwolf 45 SMG, Takeover mode, and a Fallout crossover.

items.title: New Game+ Showcase 2026 Highlights Include The Blood of Dawnwalker and Crimson Desert
items.summary: The January 8 New Game+ Showcase will spotlight 45 games, featuring titles like The Blood of Dawnwalker and Crimson Desert among Xbox and PC announcements.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Siemens and NVIDIA Announce Industrial AI Operating System at CES 2026
items.summary: Siemens and NVIDIA expanded their partnership to launch an Industrial AI Operating System, embedding AI across the industrial value chain from design to supply chains. The platform aims to transform manufacturing, production, and operations.

items.title: Intel Unveils Core Ultra Series 3 Processors at CES 2026 Keynote
items.summary: Intel showcased its Core Ultra Series 3 (Panther Lake) processors, highlighting significant improvements in speed and power efficiency over Lunar Lake predecessors for a new era of laptops.

items.title: Razer Reveals AI-Powered Gaming Headset and Desk Companion Prototypes
items.summary: Razer demonstrated Project Motoko over-ear gaming headset and an evolved Project Ava holographic desk companion, both AI-agnostic devices set for commercial release later in 2026.

items.title: Teradar Launches Summit Terahertz Vision Sensor for Autonomous Vehicles
items.summary: Teradar unveiled Summit, the world's first terahertz vision sensor for automotive ADAS and autonomous driving (L2–L5 levels), enhancing real-world vehicle perception.

items.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems Partners with NVIDIA and Siemens on Fusion Energy Digital Twin
items.summary: Commonwealth Fusion Systems, NVIDIA, and Siemens announced a collaboration to use AI for a digital twin simulation of the SPARC fusion power plant prototype, accelerating carbon-free energy development.

items.title: Amazon Rolls Out Alexa.com with Enhanced Viewing Features
items.summary: Amazon launched Alexa.com, bringing its assistant to the web with personalized movie/TV recommendations and scene-jumping capabilities via simple descriptions.
